stages.logText: I met Arensia in Fallhaven. She is being taunted by lytwings while she slumbers. I agreed to help get rid of the mischevious creatures. I should talk to Rigmor to find out more, she lives north of the tavern.
Rigmor told me that lytwings live near large rings of mushroom growth, I should look for these in the forest surrounding Fallhaven.
I have to take a gift of two red apples and two strawberries before I can talk to the lytwings. They cast some kind of spell on me for not bringing them these fruit, it made me feel very tired.
The lytwings accepted my gift, and I can now talk with them.
I offered my help to the lytwings in exchange for leaving Arensia alone. They are considering my request. I should check in with them shortly, to hear their decision.
The lytwings asked that I chop down a gnarly old tree that is inside their mushroom ring. They insisted that I use an iron axe because the cursed bark of the tree cannot be cut by other tools.
I was about to swing my axe, when the lytwings stopped me. They have changed their minds about chopping down the tree. I am beginnning to think they are indecisive on purpose.
The lytwings want four bottles of mead. I can probably find some at the Fallhaven tavern.

They took the mead, and turned around saying they want something else. I can now see why Rigmor said they are full of mischief! But I have no other choice but to continue this fool's errand, if I want to help Arensia.
I have to find twelve wild flowers for the lytwings. I wonder where I could find those. Perhaps Arensia will know.
They accepted the flowers, and as expected, said they want something else! How many more times will they make me run around?
The lytwings want a token of Arensia's promise that she will not to pick their mushrooms again. I sense they are not playing another prank this time, they seemed intent about this task.
Arensia made a promise to her mother's ring, and then she gave it to me. I should take it to the lytwings at once.
I gave Arensia's ring to the lytwings. Just when I thought it was done, they said they need something else! I am waiting on their decision.
The lytwings have agreed to stop taunting Arensia. I should go tell her.
Arensia was elated to hear that the lytwings will no longer taunt her.
I could not take the absurd errands any more. I am no longer helping Arensia with her lytwing problem.
I lied to Arensia's and kept her mother's ring for myself.
Arensia gave me her magical promise ring as reward for helping her.
